screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mind file in MeisterLabs MindMeister
screenshot.caption: MIND file open in MeisterLabs MindMeister

description: MIND files can be opened in MindMeister by selecting "Import" in the "MY MAPS" section and choosing the MIND file.
MIND files are created when a user exports a mind map in MindMeister. To do this, select the "export" icon, click "Mind Map Formats", select the "MindMeister" option, and click Export .

MIND files can be exported to various formats in MindMeister, such as .PDF , .RTF , .DOCX , and .PPTX . They can also be exported to other mind mapping formats, such as .MM , .MMAP , and .XMIND files.
